decision_reasoning: appellate body deferring to RPD's first-hand witness assessments
applicable_regulations: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act sections 110 and 111
refugee_status: claimed refugee status in Canada based on fear of persecution in Algeria due to homosexuality
application_details: Allalou's claim was rejected due to lack of credibility
procedure_followed: Allalou sought judicial review arguing incorrect standard of review was applied
result_of_case: Federal Court dismissed the application, upholding the RAD's decision and rejecting Allalou's appeal
conclusion_outcome: The Federal Court dismissed the application for judicial review, confirming that the RAD applied the appropriate standard of review
